channel.title: Guidance on Riser Platform
channel.description: Recent content in Guidance on Riser Platform

item.description: Docker # Since Riser is built on Kubernetes, it uses Docker to package and run your application. Building and publishing your own Docker images is outside the scope of the Riser project. If you’re unfamiliar with Docker, you should review the Docker documentation before proceeding with Riser. Private Registries # Riser does not yet support pod level ImagePullSecrets. If you have a private registry, you must use one of the following mechanisms:
